metadata.Title: CVE-2020-36318 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: In the standard library in Rust before 1.49.0, VecDeque::make_contiguous has a bug that pops the same element more than once under certain condition. This bug could result in a use-after-free or double free.

criterions.comment: rustc: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
